S06pspdut2u:00103_0: yā tvaṃ sarvān avadyāṅgi niravadyair nirīkṣyase//
S06pspdut2u:00105_0: yas tvāṃ paśyati bhāvena sa paśyati tathāgatam//
S06pspdut2u:00107_0: na paśyanty antaraṃ santaś candracandrikayor iva//
S06pspdut2u:00110_0: sakṛd apy āśaye śuddhe yas tvāṃ vidhivad īkṣate/
S06pspdut2u:00202_0: poṣikā janayitrī ca mātā tvam asi vatsalā//
S06pspdut2u:00203_0: yad buddhā lokaguravaḥ putrās tava kṛpālavaḥ/
S06pspdut2u:00210_0: tvāṃ prāpya pralayaṃ yānti doṣā vādāś ca vādinām//
S06pspdut2u:00213_0: yasya tvayy apy abhiṣvaṅgas tvannāthasya na vidyate/
S06pspdut2u:00215_0: nāgacchasi kutaś cittaṃ na ca kvacana gacchasi/
S06pspdut2u:00216_0: sthāneṣv api ca sarveṣu vidvadbhir nopalabhyase//
S06pspdut2u:00217_0: ye tvām evaṃ na paśyanti prapadyante ca bhāvataḥ/
S06pspdut2u:00218_0: prapadya ca vimucyante tad idaṃ mahad adbhutam//
S06pspdut2u:00301_0: tvām eva badhyate paśyann apaśyann api badhyate/
S06pspdut2u:00302_0: tvām eva mucyate paśyann apaśyann api mucyate//
S06pspdut2u:00304_0: sudurbodhāsi māyeva dṛśyase na ca dṛśyase//
S06pspdut2u:00305_0: buddhaiḥ prayekabuddhaiś ca śrāvakaiś ca niṣevitā/
S06pspdut2u:00306_0: mārgas tvam eko mokṣasya nāsty anya iti niścayaḥ//
S06pspdut2u:00308_0: kṛpayā lokanāthais tvam ucyase ca na cocyase//
S06pspdut2u:00309_0: śaktaḥ kas tvām iha stotuṃ nirnimittāṃ nirañjanām/
S06pspdut2u:00311_0: saty evam api saṃvṛtyā vākpathair vayam īdṛśaiḥ/
S06pspdut2u:00312_0: tvām astutyām api stutvā tuṣṭūṣantaḥ sunirvṛtāaḥ/
S06pspdut2u:00314_0: tenās tv āśu jagat kṛtsnaṃ prajñāpāraparāyaṇam//
S06pspdut2u:00401_0: evaṃ mayā śrutam/ ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma
S06pspdut2u:00402_0: gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ pañcamātrair bhikṣusahasraiḥ sarvair arhadbhiḥ
S06pspdut2u:00403_0: kṣīṇāsravair niṣkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair ājāneyai-
S06pspdut2u:00404_0: r mahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyair apahṛtabhārair anuprāprasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇa-
S06pspdut2u:00406_0: pañcamātrair bhikṣuṇīśatair upāsakair upāsikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ sarvair dṛṣṭadharmair apari-
S06pspdut2u:00407_0: māṇairś ca bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ sarvair dhāraṇīpratilabdhaiḥ
S06pspdut2u:00409_0: labdhair asaṅgadhāraṇīpratilabdhair acyutābhijñair ādeyavacanair akuhakair alapakair arapagata-
S06pspdut2u:00413_0: r vigatabhṛkuṭīmukhair gāthābhir gītālapanakuśalair apagatalīnacittair anācchedyaprati-
S06pspdut2u:00506_0: bhadrapālena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ratnākareṇa ca sārthavāhena ca nara-
S06pspdut2u:00507_0: dattena ca varuṇadattena ca śubhaguptena ca indradattena ca uttaramatinā ca viśeṣa-
S06pspdut2u:00508_0: matinā ca vardhamānamatinā ca amoghadarśinā ca susamprasthitena ca suvi-
S06pspdut2u:00509_0: krāntavikramiṇā ca nityodyuktena ca anikṣiptadhureṇa ca sūryagarbheṇa ca
S06pspdut2u:00510_0: anupamacintinā ca avalokiteśvareṇa ca mahāsthāmaprāptena ca mañju-
S06pspdut2u:00511_0: śriyā ca vajramatinā ca ratnamudrāhastena ca nityokṣiptahastena ca maitre-
S06pspdut2u:00512_0: yeṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evam pramukhair anekair bodhisattvakoṭīniyuta-
S06pspdut2u:00514_0: atha khalu bhagavān svayam eva siṃhāsanaṃ prajñapya nyaṣīdat paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā
S06pspdut2u:00515_0: ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya abhimukhīṃ smṛtim upasthāpya samādhirājaṃ nāma
S06pspdut2u:00516_0: samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma yatra sarvasamādhayo 'ntargamān saṃgrahaṃ samava-
S06pspdut2u:00518_0: atha khalu bhagavān smṛtimān samprajānaṃs tasmāt samādher vyutthāya
S06pspdut2u:00601_0: divyena cakṣuṣā sarvalokadhātuṃ vyavalokya sarvakāyāt smitam akarot/
S06pspdut2u:00604_0: niyutaśatasahasrāṇi niśceruḥ/ evaṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭigulphābhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir jaṃghābhyāṃ
S06pspdut2u:00605_0: ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir jānumaṇḍalābhyām evaṃ dvābhyām ūrubhyāṃ kaṭinābhimaṇḍalābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ
S06pspdut2u:00606_0: pārśvābhyāṃ hṛdayaśrīvatsāt mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāt/ evaṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir daśabhyo
S06pspdut2u:00607_0: hastāṅgulibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir dvābhyāṃ bāhubhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭir dvābhyām aṃśābhyām evaṃ grīvā-
S06pspdut2u:00608_0: yāś catvāriṃśadbhyo dantebhyo dvābhyāṃ ghrāṇābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ śrotrābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ
S06pspdut2u:00609_0: cakṣurbhyāṃ madhyādūrṇāyā upariṣṭād uṣṇīṣāt ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭī raśmikoṭīniyuta-
S06pspdut2u:00610_0: śatasahasrāṇi niśceruḥ yai raśmibhir ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāur a-
S06pspdut2u:00611_0: vabhāsito 'bhūt parisphuṭaḥ/ pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā loka-
S06pspdut2u:00612_0: dhātavas tena mahatā raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitāś cābhūvan/ evaṃ dakṣi-
S06pspdut2u:00613_0: ṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ
S06pspdut2u:00614_0: paścimottarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātava-
S06pspdut2u:00615_0: s tena mahatā raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitāś cābhūvan/ ye ca sattvās tena
S06pspdut2u:00616_0: mahatā raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitās te sarve niyatā abhūvan anu-
S06pspdut2u:00701_0: atha khalu bhagavān punar eva sarvaromakūpebhyaḥ smitam akarot/ evakikataś ca
S06pspdut2u:00703_0: trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur avabhāsitaḥ sphuṭo 'bhūt/ taiś ca pūrvasyāṃ
S06pspdut2u:00705_0: ś cābhūvan/ evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ {{diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tena mahatā raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitāś cābhūvan/
S06pspdut2u:00705_1: ye ca sattvās tena mahatā raśmyavabhāsena sphuṭā avabhāsitās te sarve niyatā abhūvan anuttarāyāṃ}} samyak-
S06pspdut2u:00707_0: atha khalu bhagavān punar eva yā sā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prakṛtiprabhā tayā
S06pspdut2u:00708_0: prabhayā trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum avabhāsayāmāsa/ yāvat sarvāsu
S06pspdut2u:00709_0: daśasu dikṣu ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavayas tā
S06pspdut2u:00710_0: prabhayā avabhāsitā abhūvan/ ye ca sattvās tayā prabhayā spṛṣṭās te sarve
S06pspdut2u:00712_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ jihvendriyaṃ nirṇāmayāmāsa/ yenemaṃ
S06pspdut2u:00714_0: mahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ jihvendriyeṇa sphuritvā tasmāj jihvendriyāt smita-
S06pspdut2u:00717_0: padmāny utpannāny abhūvan/ teṣu ca padmeṣu buddhavigrahā niṣaṇāḥ saṃsthitā-
S06pspdut2u:00718_0: ś cābhūvan dharmaṃ deśayanto yad uta imām eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharma-
S06pspdut2u:00719_0: deśanām/ te pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamavyativṛttāsaṃkhyeṣu loka-
S06pspdut2u:00720_0: dhātuṣu gatvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti sma/ evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyā-
S06pspdut2u:00801_0: m uttarasyām adhastād ūrdhvaṃ digvidikṣu/ evakikasyāṃ ca diśi daśasu dikṣu gaṅgā-
S06pspdut2u:00802_0: nadīvālukopameṣu aparimāṇeṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti
S06pspdut2u:00803_0: sma yad uta imām eva ca ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām/ ye ca sattvā-
S06pspdut2u:00804_0: s tāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇvanti te niyatā bhavanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau/
S06pspdut2u:00805_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇaḥ siṃhavikrīḍitaṃ
S06pspdut2u:00806_0: nāma samādhiṃ samāpede/ tathārupaṃ carddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskaroti sma
S06pspdut2u:00808_0: dhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāram akampata prākampata saṃprākampata/ acalat prācalat
S06pspdut2u:00809_0: saṃprācalat/ avedhat prāvedhat saṃprāvedhat/ araṇat prāraṇat
S06pspdut2u:00810_0: saṃprāraṇat/ akṣubhyat prākṣubhyat saṃprākṣubhyat/ agarjat prāgarjat
S06pspdut2u:00811_0: saṃprāgarjat/ ante unnamati madhye avanamati, madhye unnamati ante
S06pspdut2u:00813_0: atha khalu tena kṣaṇalavamuhvartena ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre loka-
S06pspdut2u:00814_0: dhātau nirayā vā tiryagyonayo vā yamalokā vā te sarve samucchinnāḥ
S06pspdut2u:00815_0: śūnyā abhūvan/ sarvākṣaṇāś cāstamitā abhūvan/ ye ca sattvās tābhyo
S06pspdut2u:00816_0: nirayatiryagyoniyamalokagatibhyaś cyūtās te sarvae tenaiva prītiprāmodyena
S06pspdut2u:00817_0: manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapannāś cābhūvan/ evaṃ cāturmahārāajikānāṃ
S06pspdut2u:00818_0: devānāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmita-
S06pspdut2u:00901_0: atha khalu te manuṣyās te ca devā bhagavata evānubhāvena pūrvajanmāny anu-
S06pspdut2u:00902_0: smaranti sma/ anusmṛtya ca tenaiva prītiprāmodyena yena bhagavāṃs tenopa-
S06pspdut2u:00903_0: saṃkrāntāḥ/ upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirobhir abhivandya bhagavantaṃ
S06pspdut2u:00904_0: prāñjalayo bhūtvā namasyanti sma/ evaṃ pūrvasyṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopa-
S06pspdut2u:00905_0: meṣu lokadhātuṣu dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ vidikṣūrdhvam adhaḥ samantā-
S06pspdut2u:00906_0: d daśasu dikṣvaikasmin digbhāge gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarve
S06pspdut2u:00907_0: nirayāḥ sarvās tiryagyonayaḥ sarve yamalokāḥ samucchinnāḥ śūnyā abhūvan/
S06pspdut2u:00908_0: sarvākṣaṇāś cāstamitā abhūvan/ ye ca sattvās tābhyo nirayatiryagyoni-
S06pspdut2u:00909_0: yamalokagatibhyaś cyutās te sarve devamanuṣyeṣūpapadyante sma/ te ca devam anu-
S06pspdut2u:00910_0: ṣyeṣūpapannā bhagavata evānubhāvena pūrvanivāsam anusmaranti sma/ anusmṛtya ca
S06pspdut2u:00911_0: tenaiva prītiprāmodyena svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ye tatra buddhā bhagavanta utpannā-
S06pspdut2u:00912_0: s teṣām antikam upasaṃkrāntāḥ/ upasaṃkramya teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pāda-
S06pspdut2u:00913_0: vandanāṃ kṛtvā sarve prāñjalayo bhūtvā bhagavato namasyanti sma/
S06pspdut2u:00914_0: atha khalu ye 'smiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau jātyandhāḥ
S06pspdut2u:00915_0: sattvās te cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyanti sma/ vadhirāḥ sattvāḥ śrotreṇa śabdān
S06pspdut2u:00916_0: śṛṇvanti sma/ unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilabhante sma/ vikṣiptacittā
S06pspdut2u:00917_0: ekāgracittā bhavanti sma/ jighatsitāḥ pūrṇapātrā bhavanti sma/
S06pspdut2u:00918_0: tṛṣitā vigatapipāsā bhavanti sma/ rogaspṛṣṭā viagatarogā bhavanti
S06pspdut2u:00919_0: sma/ hīnendriyāḥ paripūrṇendriyā bhavanti sma/ avirahitākuśala-
S06pspdut2u:01001_0: bhavanti sma/ sarvasattvāś ca mātāpitṛsamacittā bhavanti sma, bhrātṛbhaginī-
S06pspdut2u:01003_0: sevinaś ca bhavanti sma/ brahmacāriṇaḥ śucayo nirāmayagandhāḥ sarvasattvāś ca
S06pspdut2u:01004_0: sarvasukhasamarpitā īdṛśaṃ sukhaṃ pratlabhante sma tad yathāpi nāma tṛtīyadhyāna-
S06pspdut2u:01005_0: samāpannasya bhikṣoḥ tasminn eva ca samaye evaṃrūpayā prajñayā te samanvāgatā
S06pspdut2u:01006_0: bhavanti sma/ yad anyabuddhakṣetrasthā buddhā bhagavanta evam udānayanti sma
S06pspdut2u:01007_0: sādhu damaḥ sādhu saṃyamaḥ sādhu vīrṇo brahmacaryyāvāsaḥ sādhu prāṇibhūte-
S06pspdut2u:01009_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva saṃhāsane niṣanaḥ imaṃ trisāhasramahā-
S06pspdut2u:01010_0: sāhasraṃ lokadhātum abhibhūya tathāgatas tiṣṭhati bhāsate tapati virocate sma
S06pspdut2u:01011_0: ābhayā varṇena śriyā tejasā ca/ pūrvasyāṃ diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyā-
S06pspdut2u:01012_0: m uttarasyām adhastād ūrdhvaṃ digvidikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn abhibhūya
S06pspdut2u:01013_0: tathāgatas tiṣṭhati bhāsate/ tad yathāpi nāma sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ sarvaparvatā-
S06pspdut2u:01014_0: n abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate {{tapati virocate sma ābhayā varṇena śriyā}} tejasā ca/
S06pspdut2u:01015_0: evam eva bhagavān sarvalokadhātūn abhibhūya tiṣṭhati bhāsate {{tapati virocate sma ābhayā varṇena śriyā}}
S06pspdut2u:01016_0: tejasā ca/ evam eva bhagavān sarvalokadhātūn abhibhūya
S06pspdut2u:01017_0: tiṣṭhati bhāsate {{tapati virocate sma ābhayā varṇena śriyā}} tejasā ca/
S06pspdut2u:01018_0: atha khalu bhagavān punar eva yādṛk trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau
S06pspdut2u:01019_0: sattvānām ātmabhāvas tatsamānam ātmabhāvaṃ prākṛtam upadarśayāmāsa/ atha khalu
S06pspdut2u:01101_0: kṛtvā ābhāsvarā brahmakāyikā devāḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaś ca nirmāṇa-
S06pspdut2u:01102_0: ratayaś ca tuṣitāś ca yāmāś ca trayastriṃśāś ca cāturmahārājakāyikāś ca devās te
S06pspdut2u:01103_0: taṃ tathāgasyāsecanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā divyāḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavile-
S06pspdut2u:01106_0: gṛhītvā yena tathāgatasyāsecanaka ātmabhāvas tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/ ye ceha
S06pspdut2u:01108_0: m ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthalajalajāni puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā yena tathāgatasyā-
S06pspdut2u:01110_0: atha khalu te devās te ca mānuṣās tābhir divyābhiḥ puṣpadhūpagandha-
S06pspdut2u:01112_0: puṣpais tathāgatakāyam avakiranti sma abhyavakiranti sma/
S06pspdut2u:01114_0: patākāvaijayantīvarṣaiḥ sthalajalajaiś ca puṣpair bhagavān avakīrṇas tāni ca sarvāṇi
S06pspdut2u:01116_0: m ekaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ saṃsthitam abhūt/ tataś ca kūṭāgārāt tāni divyāni
S06pspdut2u:01117_0: puṣpapaṭṭadāmāni lambante pralambante sma/ taiś ca puṣpadāmabhiḥ paṭṭadāmabhi-
S06pspdut2u:01118_0: ś cāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur atīvāśobhata/ tena ca suvarṇa-
S06pspdut2u:01119_0: varṇena bhagavataḥ prabhāvabhāsena daśasu dikṣu prasṛtena ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgā-
S06pspdut2u:01201_0: nadīvālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭāvabhāsitāś cābhūvan/ asmiṃś ca
S06pspdut2u:01202_0: trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarveṣu cāturdvīpakeṣu lokadhātuṣu teṣāṃ
S06pspdut2u:01203_0: devamanuṣyāṇāñ ca ekaikasyaitad abhūt/ mama puratas tathāgato niṣaṇo
S06pspdut2u:01205_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇaḥ punar eva smitam akarot/
S06pspdut2u:01207_0: yāvad daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan/ ye
S06pspdut2u:01208_0: ca trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau sattvās te sarve pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgā-
S06pspdut2u:01209_0: nadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti sma saśrāvakasaṃghān
S06pspdut2u:01210_0: tasyāñ ca pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvās te
